column1: #Text=Lau Gan - Lan says : " This is an outrage !
#Text=That 's what they all say ... " Reporter says : " Is it true that Cabbage Corp is conspiring with the Equalists ?
#Text=" Lin says : " The evidence points in that direction , but the investigation is ongoing .
#Text=For the time being , we have frozen Mr. Gan - Lan 's assets and are closing Cabbage Corp. " Lau Gan - Lan says : " No !
